Description:
Perfect investment Opportunity~lease end April 2021
Here's a great chance to secure this neat&easy care home on a 440 m2 smart block close to all amenities. Offering formal entry with the windows, open living zone with generous meals dining area lead to the well-proportioned kitchen with ample storage room and benchtop. 4 generous bedrooms, 2 with BIRS and 1 accessing to the undercover decking area by sliding door. Large laundry with a separate toilet, middle hall way with a separate bath, shower & vanity. Surrounded by neat and front low-maintained gardens, north facing private backyard and there's room for the pets too. With double carport area with a garden shed behind, there's room for a small boat or trailer which is often hard to find in homes like this. Other features include dishwasher and new painting all rooms, new flooring around living area, gas heating and fans.
It could be perfect for a retired couple looking to downsizing to Grovedale or first home buyers and investors will enjoy the fantastic location close to IGA, ALDI and Marshall Station only minutes away. The Waurn Ponds/Barwon River bike path is close by too, linking the city, Waurn Ponds, Deakin Uni & Epworth Hospital & the Bus service is only meters away. Call today for more information.
Insights: 99 Marshalltown Road, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 77 other 4 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Make your mark within 500m to the beach.
***Appointments via private inspection only. Please call Mitchell Falzon at any time to schedule a viewing.***
Lock in your chance to purchase this family home, holiday or investment property within walking distance to Torquay's beachfront.
This brick, double storey home welcomes you to 3 bedrooms all with built-in robes, a convenient central bathroom with a separate toilet and the master serviced by it's own ensuite with a spa bath. Upstairs you'll find a neat, well-lit kitchen for the savvy chef and a living area complimented by a slow combustion fireplace and split system air conditioning to keep you comfortable all year round. Sitting on a 651m2 (approx.) allotment you're surrounded by your very own garden oasis and offered a generously sized workshop and an oversized double garage.
You're proudly and conveniently located nearby schools for all ages, state-of-the-art sports facilities, multiple parks and reserves that you can choose from, 500m away from one of the most popular beaches and surf destinations and with easy access to the world renowned Great Ocean Road.
An opportunity like this doesn't come very often so now is your chance!
Insights: 16 Aquilla Avenue, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 126 other 3 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Shovel ready land with plans
Residing in one of Geelong's most premium lifestyle estates in Wandana Villawood is this virtually flat smart block. With views over the rolling hills of Highton, Ceres and more, this property boasts the perfect start to what will be an exquisite home to first home buyers, investors and families alike.
Surrounded by quality homes
0.7m approx. fall from back to front of block
Views to the East and West
Family friendly area with a proposed $800,000 upgrade to Drewan Park
Epworth Hospital and Deakin University five minutes away
Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre ten minutes away
Quick access to the Geelong Ring Road to commute to Melbourne
No body corporate for this lot
Insights: 39 Brownhill Ridge, Wandana Heights VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Neat, Tidy, Affordable Living
This neat and tidy well located unit is perfect for the downsizer, investor or first homebuyer looking for low maintenance living. Walking distance to Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, High St shops, sporting fields and local schools. Comprising of 2 good size bedrooms, spacious living flowing into the kitchen area plus central bathroom. This delightful unit has been freshly updated and is complete with your own courtyard. Includes split system A/C and off-street parking with single carport. This home presents a great opportunity to enter todays growing Belmont market.

Description:
Contemporary living In Sought After Locale
PLEASE CONTACT US TO REGISTER FOR OPEN INSPECTIONS
Nestled amongst quality homes in one of Leopolds most convenient locations is this stunning family home. Upon entering you will be surprised by its natural size and what it has to offer. As you walk through, you have the front living room to your left, a calming spot to kick back and relax and the master bedroom to your right.
Overlooking the front garden, the spacious Master Bedroom creates a private oasis for parents. The walk-in robe is wonderfully spacious with an en-suite. Three additional generous size bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the main bathroom and separate toilet. Add to this a double remote lock-up garage with internal access, gas ducted heating throughout and a split system in the open plan living room keeping you comfortable in all seasons.
The stylish kitchen with large island stone bench has plenty of cupboard space, Technika 5 burner gas cook top, Westinghouse electric wall oven, pantry and dishwasher. A spacious open plan kitchen, meals and living area with convenient sliding door access to outdoor undercover alfresco area. This indoor-outdoor flow is ideal for everyday living and entertaining.
With the Portarlington Hwy just on your doorstep and a 10 minute drive to Geelong, 50 minutes to Melbourne and the rest of Bellarine nearby you will be spoilt for choice. Only 5 minutes to Gateway Plaza shopping centre, local schools, kindergartens and sporting facilities.
This wonderful home is an ideal entry into this ever-popular suburb or the perfect investment. With a low maintenance back yard area on a manicured 496m2 allotment (approx). If you're looking for the perfect family home without compromising on lifestyle, then don't go past this fabulous single-level home.
Insights: 34 Curtain Drive, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 94 other 4 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Lake View 12.62 ha 31 acres approx.
With stunning views of Lake Connewarre, this superbly positioned lifestyle property on approximately 31 acres of land is on the fringe of residential development/zoning and offers a superb country lifestyle or land banking opportunity.
Surrounded by established trees with two road frontages, the long driveway sets the solid brick home away from the road in a private hilltop position. This ideal lifestyle property is suited to horses, cropping or establishing a vineyard.
The homestead consists of three bedrooms, master with walk in robe and ensuite, family room with wood fire, separate dining room, kitchen/dining/living with wood fire and split system, bathroom, laundry and undercover pergola.
Externally there is a four car garage, tandem carport, workshop with cement floor, machinery sheds, garden shed, bird aviary, three large dams and the property is connected to town water.
Perfectly positioned for lifestyle convenience close to Leopold's Gateway Plaza, sports complex, schools, public transport, medical facilities, 10 minutes to Geelong CBD, an hour to Melbourne and within easy access to the Bellarine Peninsula's award winning wineries, restaurants, surf beaches and golf courses.
Insights: 922-950 Bellarine Highway, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
HIGHLIGHT YOUR FAMILY LIFESTYLE
PLEASE CONTACT US TO REGISTER FOR OPEN INSPECTIONS
When location is everything, this is the home you have been waiting for. Magnificently situated within 700 meters of Highton Village & Barwon River (approx.) and only meters from Roslyn Primary & Belmont High, this is an opportunity with endless possibilities.
This stylish family home retains some original detail including high decorative ceilings and beautiful oak flooring, whilst offering contemporary comfort with an updated kitchen (European appliances) and a new gas log fireplace in the formal living space, three bedrooms & study/4th bedroom, spacious bathroom, meals area, casual sitting with full sized laundry and tandem lock up garage. Sitting behind a high front fence on a generous 850 sqm allotment with a north facing backyard it offers the perfect opportunity to take it to the next level with further renovations and extensions. Alternatively it offers the new owners either a brilliant site for the construction of a luxurious new home or townhouse complex (STCA). Surrounded by a well-established garden,
Underpinned by a sought-after family lifestyle location, close to all local amenities, public transport, an excellent array of both private and public schools with Belmont High zoning or walking distance to the highly regarded Clairevaux Catholic school plus numerous surrounding shopping & cafe options, as well as secondary & tertiary education. Lease or occupy, this is a property you dont want to miss!.
3D walk through virtual tour available, please follow the link below

Description:
Terrific Family Home on a Large Corner Allotment
Set on a large corner allotment of 763m2 approx. this light-filled home offers comfortable and spacious family living. Desirably positioned opposite Grovedale Recreation Reserve, you will love the outlook, convenience and potential this home has to offer.
- Nido Early School and Grovedale Primary School just minutes away
- Enjoy proximity to sporting ovals, local shops and public transport
- Close to Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre and Marshall Station
- Light-filled open plan living/dining features beautiful timber floors
- Stylish kitchen with b/in pantry, 900mm stove, oven and a dishwasher
- Upstairs master bedroom boasts an en suite, walk-in and built-in robes
- Three additional bedrooms feature built-in robes
- Well-appointed central bathroom and a separate laundry
- Central heating and cooling provide year-round comfort
- Enjoy undercover decked alfresco with built-in bench seating
- Spacious and secure backyard with established gardens
- Remote double lock-up garage and a large workshop
- Off-street parking for a caravan, boat, or trailer
- Ideal for young families, tradies, investors and developers (STCA)

Description:
Grovedales Hidden Treasure
Located centrally to all of Grovedale's desired amenities, this flat 324sqm allotment presents an exciting and unique chance to capitalise on the constant delays and rising costs of land in Geelong's developing suburbs to build a property to suit your lifestyle!
Whether you're hoping to get into the market for the first time or you've sold the big family home and looking for the perfect "lock up and leave" downsizer - here's the opportunity! The astute builder/developer will also be handsomely rewarded for investing in a blue chip location and capitalise on Grovedale's surge to become one of Geelong's top performing suburbs.
With prior plans to build, the current owner has prepared some exceptional concept draft plans (available upon request) for a two storey 3-4 bedroom property taking advantage of the north facing aspect and allowing for maximum open space
All close by:
- Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Homemaker Centre & Leisurelink
- Deakin University & Epworth Hospital
- Easy access to Surf Coast Highway & Geelong Ring Road
- Multiple Primary & Secondary Schools

Description:
Exquisite Provincial near the River
All inspections welcome via private viewing. Please contact agent to arrange an inspection.
Homes that exude such opulence and exclusive style are rare. Surrounded by the most stunning manicured established gardens, and featuring a luxurious French style throughout, this indulgent home includes top of the line features rarely seen, and is an experience you will never forget. Boasting a huge entertainers kitchen and bar surrounded by an array of windows which cleverly capture the beautiful garden aspect, plus stunning outdoor entertaining area, this home is a private oasis, close to all your conveniences and only a short stroll to the Barwon River.
Features include:
Four bedrooms plus study/fifth bedroom, two bathrooms two living areas
Fully renovated to an incredible standard
Ornate features such as classic cornicing, plaster features and pillars
Kitchen: Rare natural Quartzite benchtops, premium feature cabinetry, dual ovens, induction and gas cooktops, exquisite garden views, three integrated dishwashers plus butlers pantry
Bathroom: floor to ceiling tiling, European quality
Large outdoor entertaining undercover decked area
North facing large backyard with exquisite established garden
Central heating and refrigerated cooling
Underfloor heating in living and ensuite
3kw Solar, garden shed and in-ceiling storage
Fyans Park Primary School Zone
Geelong College, Sacred Heart & St Josephs College close by
Walking distance to Queens Park
Insights: 28 Highett Road, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2011 and 29 other 5 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Bespoke Quality and Design
With high end quality fixtures and fittings throughout, this 4-year-old, custom built residence is positioned perfectly in a private, tucked away pocket of Leopold and with the Bellarine Rail Trail at your doorstep, this is a sure standout on the market!
Oozing the ultimate in luxury and elegant design, the home is cleverly zoned for practical living with the growing family in mind and offers an incredibly light, bright and airy feel. The main hub lends itself in the way of an open plan chef's kitchen with all ASKO appliances, including electric pyrolytic oven, separate steam oven, combination induction and gas cook top, dishwasher, granite benchtops and butler's pantry, while overlooking the dining and living space. The master retreat sits at the fore of the home with walk-in-robe, additional built-in-robe and lavish ensuite. The remaining 3 bedrooms all sit from the rear West Wing and make for the perfect set up for multigenerational/dual occupancy living and serviced by a central bathroom. A separate lounge/media room, study nook with built-in-shelves, laundry and drying room complete this unique home.
What really sets it apart from the rest is the phenomenal garaging and storage on offer. A DLUG, separate SLUG with through access to the backyard and additional 4x4.6m garage/workshop, will be a dream for all tradies, those with multiple cars, trailers or who work from home. Also comprising an expansive undercover entertaining deck, alfresco and established low maintenance gardens with room to tinker.
Additional Features Include: Hydronic heating, evaporative cooling, plantation shutters, grand 2.7m ceilings, ceiling fans, spotted Gum floors, a plethora of storage and sky lights fitted in the butler's pantry, ensuite and walk-in-robe.
With Leopold offering the perfect blend of city and coastal living and with local amenities and infrastructure continuing to grow, make your move today!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
Insights: 17 Pienza Way, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 94 other 4 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Contemporary, Stylish And Efficiently Designed
Private Inspections Welcome!
Downsizing, upsizing, or simply looking to enhance your lifestyle; this beautifully finished home offers the flexibility and the comfort to appeal to the most discerning buyer. Set on a 448sqm allotment, the home combines the freedom of a family home, but zoned to offer or reduce space whenever it is needed. It boasts the thoughtful design of the quintessential downsizer, including low maintenance established gardens, single level living, open plan living and a second living space; all in a location that captures the convenience and culture of surf coast living. The home is only a few hundred metres away from the Sands Golf course, so you can enjoy the access & location without the fees; walking distance to the beach, and a short drive to the shopping centre. The property is ideal for those looking for the quality and style of a new home, without having to live through the building process; the peace of mind that there will be no maintenance, and the benefit of a free-flowing design. Thoughtfully planned, and purposely executed to ensure the quality compliments the design, the features include; North facing rear yard, raked ceiling to the entrance to capture the morning sun, 4 spacious bedrooms, master with ensuite, including a double shower; a WIR & BIR's to the remaining 3 bedrooms, custom designed kitchen with exception storage, multiple work areas, stone bench tops and a 900mm freestanding stove, study nook, an undercover entertaining area, automated irrigation system to the lawns & garden, double garage with internal access and all finished off with neutral tones throughout so you can personalise to suit.
Insights: 49 Lowtide Drive, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 139 other 4 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
A private oasis
Wonderfully located within Hightons prestigious Shoubra Estate, this immaculate, renovated family home is a private and secure oasis. Set on a good sized allotment of 976m2 (approx.), the home has an abundance of natural light throughout and features delightful garden vistas from every room. The practical floor plan offers a spacious entry foyer flowing to the beautifully proportioned formal living room. The sleek styled kitchen has been refurbished in a functional design with top of the range Siemens appliances and Neolith benchtops and splashbacks. Adjoining the kitchen is the light filled meals area and informal family room. The expansive outdoor entertaining area blends seamlessly with the thoughtfully landscaped garden. The main bedroom provides a tranquil retreat with a captivating garden outlook. The en-suite has been recently renovated. A further three bedrooms feature built-in robes and are serviced by a central family bathroom, also recently renovated.
External features include a double remote garage, workshop, cellar, sound-proofed studio, in-ground solar heated pool, and manicured gardens to complete the scene. This established home offers a highly sought after and enviable lifestyle. The convenience of its central location in the heart of Highton, combined with its privacy and space, provides an opportunity that most only dream of.
For more information on this property text '2 Remony' to 0428 444 841
GO TO www.whitfordproperty.com.au TO VIEW MORE PROPERTIES EXCLUSIVE TO OUR WEBSITE ONLY

Description:
Low Maintenance & Perfectly Positioned
Nestled on a generous and low maintenance 414m2 (approx), this neat as a pin home has been fully repainted with new carpet throughout and is move in ready. Perfectly positioned within minutes to Highton Village Café Precinct, Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Epworth Hospital, Deakin University and the M1 taking you to Melbourne in under an hour.
This home presents a fantastic opportunity for the astute investor, downsizer or first home buyer alike. Showcasing an abundance of natural light this practical floor plan is comprised of a very spacious lounge room with air conditioner and gas wall furnace to ensure your comfort all year around. An updated kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances as well as ample bench and storage space with a separate dining room.
The three bedrooms are well proportioned with built in robes and share a central bathroom and separate toilet. Other features include a double lock up garage with secure internal access, private rear courtyard and all this while being conveniently located close to all amenities including public transport, quality schools, world class health care, recreational facilities and walking tracts.
Insights: 1/1 Waddington Court, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 138 other 3 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
VERY SOLID FASHAM & JOHNSON BUILD IN OLD LEOPOLD.
Popular builders from the 70's and still current today this solid home has been tastefully re-decorated and beautifully presented on a lovely landscaped allotment of 788M2.
Lots of natural light transpire into the living, dining kitchen area further enhanced by the embossed timber flooring. Updated kitchen adjoined by the very roomy dining space and large living area providing split system cooling and gas heating. Three or four bedrooms/study, master offering semi ensuite with toilet, 2nd family bathroom with the shower over the bath. Undercover entertaining area or all year round enjoyment, side drive access to an undercover three car carport plus additional shed for workshop and storage. Very private and secure property with high fencing for you to enjoy your tranquil time in the vast gardens with a variety of trees and shrubs and an abundance of space for the kids to roam . Well presented and positioned in Leopold close to transport and the growing shopping centre. First home buyer's will rejoice with what is on offer.

Description:
OLD TORQUAY WHEN LOCATION IS EVERYTHING!!!
This functional, low maintenance property is situated in one of the most convenient locations Torquay has to offer!! Built over two levels and boasts 3 good-sized bedrooms, master with walk in robe and semi en-suite, built in robes to the further bedrooms and two-way bathroom to the downstairs bedroom. An open plan kitchen, meals and living area open out to a private courtyard with a northerly aspect and a second living area located at the front of the home also boasts a courtyard and tranquil garden a great zone to entertain. Complete with ducted heating, ceiling fans, Bosch appliances, solar power, timber floorboards and single lock up garage with rear roller door access. This home is sure to appeal to downsizers, professionals and investors alike or those looking to secure a perfect lifestyle property with great access to the beach and bowls club via Taylor Park, medical facilities and Torquays main shopping precinct. Situated on 239m2 (approx.) low maintenance allotment and well-established gardens, this property needs to be inspected to be truly appreciated.

Dont miss out on the opportunity to build your forever home in this premier estate.
Contact us directly today.

Description:
Beautifully renovated.
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Cam on 0406 597 050.
Please check our Head Office guidelines below before meeting with one of our agents or before viewing a property by appointment.
Visit: https://www.barryplant.com.au/cms/document/view/118/COVID-19_Online_Information_v2.pdf for more information.
ONLINE AUCTION 23rd May 2020 at 3pm
For sale via Market Buy (Market Buy is an online auction platform that allows flexible terms for qualified buyers).
This home can sell at any time. To register your interest to bid please contact Kieron on 0435 798 405 to become qualified.
All the hard work has been done for you. This gorgeously renovated home in the sought after locale of Belmont can be moved straight into. Upon entry, you're welcomed by stunning polished floorboards, which really sets the tone and character of the property. Offering three bedrooms, master with walk in robe and ensuite, and the remainder of the bedrooms with built in robes and are serviced by the elegant central bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles. The spacious, light filled open plan kitchen and dining flows effortlessly into the generous light filled living space. Featuring stone benchtops, Miele dishwasher and plenty of storage space, this kitchen is perfect for the home chef. Out onto the north facing backyard, through the study nook, lies loads of grassed space for kids and pets to play and ample room for entertaining friends and family.
Workshop benching in the shed provides the space for the everyday handy man, plus car accommodation for two cars. The long driveway also allows for plenty off-street parking. Conveniently positioned within walking distance to Clairvaux Catholic School, McDonald Reserve and just moments from the Highton Village, High Street shops, Belmont High and public transport, your daily commute will become seamless. Extras include ducted heating through the floor, two air conditioning split systems, gas log fireplace in dining area and ceiling fans in each room. Situated on approximately 653sqm, this captivating home allows you to move straight in and not do a thing.

Description:
Bluestone perfection.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Cam on 0406 597 050.
Please check our Head Office guidelines below before meeting with one of our agents or before viewing a property by appointment.
Visit: https://www.barryplant.com.au/cms/document/view/118/COVID-19_Online_Information_v2.pdf for more information.
ONLINE AUCTION 23rd May 2020 at 2pm
For sale via Market Buy (Market Buy is an online auction platform that allows flexible terms for qualified buyers).
This home can sell at any time. To register your interest to bid please contact Kieron on 0435 798 405 to become qualified.
The second you set your eyes on this home, you will truly be in awe. Exposed bluestone bricks, timber lined ceilings and slate flooring are just some of the elements that piece together this majestic work of art, oozing rare character and warmth that is just not found anymore. High ceilings and split level design combined with the views of the reserve, exude a grand sense of space and ambience. This property offers three generous sized bedrooms with built in robes, master suite with its own ensuite, study & sunken lounge overlooking the beautiful & tranquil Pepperdine Park. All bedrooms are serviced by the central bathroom, including the fourth bedroom/rumpus room.
Flooded with natural light, the kitchen is perfected with Merbau bench tops & Tasmanian oak cabinets with views to the reserve. Leading off the spacious lounge, the undercover alfresco is the ideal spot for entertaining or enjoying your morning cuppa. With direct access from the gorgeous rear garden out onto the reserve, taking your four legged friends for a walk has never been easier. French doors feature throughout, along with a split system and gas log fireplace in the living, plus a 5kw solar panel system, powering the entire property.
With the ability to close off the second half of the house off in the hallway, privacy that teenagers, parents or Airbnb guests fancy is proven. The opportunity to create a timeless Airbnb retreat using the third and fourth bedroom, bathroom and laundry, is possible and has been done successfully in the past.
In the heart of leafy Highton and just moments from the adored community in the Highton Village, quality schooling of all ages, Waurn Ponds shopping mecca, Epworth Hospital and the Ring Road taking commuters to Melbourne in under an hour.
Upon your private inspection, you will simply fall in love.
Insights: 31 Lansell Drive, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 108 other 4 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Sensational Cypress!
Here is your opportunity to secure just over an acre of titled land in one of the most prestigious pockets of Torquay!
Located close to the local schools, shops, beaches and all that the Torquay and the Surfcoast has to offer, this wonderful 4110 m2 (approx.) parcel of land will make the perfect site for your new home.
If privacy, prestige, space and location and are important values to you, then you will want to secure 4 Cypress Lane. Act now so that you can create an amazing home for your family to enjoy.

Description:
Live Amongst The Moonah Trees
The property has met reserve. The Openn Negotiation (auction held online with flexible terms for qualified buyers) is underway and the property can sell as early as tomorrow. Contact Peta ph 0439 354 362 or Levi ph 0408 552 539 immediately to become qualified and avoid missing out.
The Feel:
Live in close connection to nature, with north living & a wall of glass bifold doors framing the views of your very own Moonah forest in the shady backyard. The forest walking trail is only steps away, offering handy proximity to the river, beach & Village Parklands. Multi-faceted decks invite outdoor living, while inside under high ceilings, this large family home boasts the versatility of a spacious kitchen & meals area, 2 living areas, 4 bedrooms plus a dedicated home office or study.
The Facts:
-Large 4 BR home plus study on 892sqm approx. with versatile indoor/outdoor living
-Entire north side of bifold doors with phantom fly screens, opens onto deck
-Very private aspect, fully fenced with side gate access for trailer or storage
-Spacious Master with raked ceiling, en suite, WIR, ceiling fan & TV point
-3 more carpeted bedrooms with BIRs, most with ceiling fans
-Tassie Oak floors throughout, with 2 generous family living areas
-Open plan living & adjacent meals area with large kitchen, quality appliances & walk-in pantry
-SSAC in main living, plus ceiling fans & gas ducted heating provide year-round comfort
-Central bathroom with toilet, shower, freestanding bath & double vanity
-DLUG with workshop bench & storage, garden shed & compost zone
-Coastal setting in desirable street with no-thru traffic
-Walk to the to the Village Park, Beach, Barwon Heads Primary & Hitchcock Avenue
The Owner Loves.
Saratoga Avenue is a very friendly street. Our family have enjoyed our time here. With so much space and privacy and the luxury of daily walks through the Coastal Moonah Forrest.
